alert.note: Alert for Lassen-Eastern Plumas-Eastern Sierra Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 14 at 8:19PM PST until January 17 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST TUESDAY... * CHANGES...None. * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 3 inches, except 8 to 15 inches west of Highway 395. * WHERE...Lassen-Eastern Plumas-Eastern Sierra Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult through Sunday morning. Conditions will improve Sunday but may deteriorate again Sunday night into Monday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A lull in activity will occur through most of Sunday. A second burst of heavy snow is possible Sunday night into Monday morning.
info.instruction: Avoid travel if possible, you could be stuck in your vehicle for many hours. If you must travel, prepare for long delays and carry an emergency kit with extra food, water and clothing. If you stay home, have a backup plan in case of power outages. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Avoid travel if possible, you could be stuck in your vehicle for many hours. If you must travel, prepare for long delays and carry an emergency kit with extra food, water and clothing. If you stay home, have a backup plan in case of power outages. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
